name: webrdbms-monorepo
description: WebRDBMS - A complete relational database management system (Monorepo)

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && black --check app/ && isort --check-only app/ && mypy app/
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black app/ && isort app/
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

author: Developer
